Desc.entry: Drama lessons for children and young people aged 6-18 years and stagecraft classes for children aged 5-18 years incorporating acting, singing and dancing. Prepares students for grade examinations, full scale productions, confidence-building and presentation training. Also offers group and individual singing tuition for adults and children aged 7 years and over, and salsacise classes for adults.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Dore and Totley United Reformed Church

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Limited wheelchair access is available, please call ahead for details

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Wed 4.30-6pm (drama aged 6-10 years), 6-7.30pm (drama aged 11-18 years), Thurs at 4pm onwards (singing for children aged 7 years and over), 6.30-7.30pm (youth singing group), 7.30-8.30pm (singing for adults), 5.30-6.30pm (freestyle and street dance for children aged 8-11 years), 6.30-7.15pm (freestyle and street dance for children aged 12 and over), 7.30-8.15pm (adults salsacise and danceacise), Fri 3.30-4.15pm (freestyle and street dance for children aged 8-11 years), 3.45-5.15pm (drama aged 6-10 years), 4.30-5.15pm (freestyle and street dance for children aged 12 years and over), 5.30-7.30pm (stagecraft classes ages 5-10 years). Please contact prior to attendance of any classes.
